descriptions.bridge_gap: Build a bridge to cross the gap
descriptions.build_out_beacon: Makes exploration in surrounding sectors easier
descriptions.build_out_luxury_outpost: Gives access to the luxury resource found in this level, making workers happier.
descriptions.build_out_tradepost_connector: Allows traders and workers to cross the level safely.
descriptions.claim_milestone: Claim a new level and unlock new things.
descriptions.clear_debris: Clear the debris blocking the way.
descriptions.clear_workshop: Scout the workshop to see if it can be used.
descriptions.flee: Abandon what you were doing and run.
descriptions.improve_in_hospital: Reduce treatment costs and enable augmentations
descriptions.launch: Leave this planet and launch for the great unknown.
descriptions.move_camp_global: Shortcut to the camp on this level.
descriptions.move_camp_level: Shortcut back to the nearest camp.
descriptions.move_level_down: Use the passage to move one level down
descriptions.move_level_up: Use the passage to move one level up
descriptions.nap: Sleep rough and regain a bit of stamina.
descriptions.scout_locale_i: Find out if there is anyone living here.
descriptions.scout_locale_u: Scout for additional resources and evidence.
descriptions.use_in_hospital_2: Add implants that improve overall health
descriptions.use_in_temple: Donate silver for favour with the spirits
descriptions.use_item_glowstick_1: Create a temporary light in this location.
